name: spiritlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no energy or enthusiasm: Local people sat by the road, spiritlessly making baskets for tourists. There were lots of students at the party, and they all floated about spiritlessly.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the second half, he collapsed spiritlessly against his re-energized opponent.Most of them spiritlessly follow the established rules.She answered spiritlessly, "Here or anywhere; it's all the same to me."With her head bent over, she moved spiritlessly towards the back door.
